Posted By: Tom Botticelli
Hello,

I have a nice N43 Morrell for sale.  The card is in really nice condition except for a small stamp on the back with initials FW.  The card is guaranteed to grade.  If interested please email me at tbotticell@aol.com.  Shipping and insurance are on me.  My asking price is $1400.

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1169351590.JPG[/IMG]

Thanks,

Tom
